channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #诺瓦克-德约科维奇宣布退出印第安维尔斯大师赛

item.title: 36 岁的厨师弗雷德里克-帕姆奎斯特（Fredrik Palmqvist）说："这对国家有好处。然而，非政府组织工作人员克尔斯廷-贝尔盖（Kerstin Bergea）认为瑞典加入北约是 "一个历史性错误"。斯德哥尔摩申请加入以美国为首的联盟的原因是--...
item.description:
VIDEO: Swedes divided over country's NATO membership.

"It's good for the country" says Fredrik Palmqvist, a 36-year-old chef. However, Kerstin Bergea, an NGO worker, sees Sweden's accession as "a historic mistake". Stockholm's bid to join the US-led alliance was prompted -… pic.twitter.com/5zGc3hiybD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 航空公司监察机构正在调查一架飞往新西兰的波音飞机为何在飞行途中突然失去高度，导致多名惊恐万分的乘客受伤。
item.description:
Airline watchdogs investigating why a Boeing-made plane bound for New Zealand violently lost altitude mid-flight, injuring a host of terrified passengershttps://t.co/ew2ej3Mm1d pic.twitter.com/Lc6rwV6xvA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 绿色和平组织呼吁在加拉帕戈斯群岛建立公海保护区。加拉帕戈斯群岛拥有独特的动植物群，是世界上最大的海洋保护区之一，但就在保护区之外，"工业化捕鱼船队仍在继续掠夺海洋"。
item.description:
Greenpeace calls for high seas protected area in Galapagos.

The islands, with their unique fauna and flora, are home to one of the world's largest marine protected areas but just outside it "industrial fishing fleets continue to plunder the oceans"https://t.co/3KSfrYuVOw pic.twitter.com/sUltaiVA03

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 奥斯卡颁奖典礼收视率攀升至近 2000 万，"奥本海默 "傲视群雄。美国广播公司（ABC）周日晚的盛典好评如潮，收视率几乎是大流行病时期收视率最低点 1040 万的两倍，但仍低于十年前的 4000 万。
item.description:
Oscars ratings climb to almost 20 million as 'Oppenheimer' reigns.

Broadcaster ABC's figure for Sunday night's well-reviewed gala was nearly double the pandemic-era ratings nadir of 10.4 million, but still lower than the 40 million of just a decade agohttps://t.co/9UwyvqSOAs pic.twitter.com/KKBNOVXhIX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: Airbnb 禁止在客人住所内安装监控摄像头
item.description:
Airbnb bans security cameras inside guest homeshttps://t.co/w5Hf1GSVD0 pic.twitter.com/X9wCWTJPwf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 12, 2024

item.title: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）声称，美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在一次会面中告诉他，他不会为乌克兰战争 "捐献一分钱"--特朗普的团队对这一说法不予置评。
item.description:
Hungary's Prime Minister Viktor Orban has asserted former US president Donald Trump told him during a meeting that he would "not give a penny" to the war in Ukraine -- a claim Trump's team did not comment on https://t.co/d58JUdhLK7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 周一，在爱尔兰科克市的圣安东尼小学（St. Anthony's），空气中弥漫着一股好莱坞的魅力。
item.description:
There was a whiff of Hollywood glamour in the air on Monday at St. Anthony's, a primary school in the Irish city of Cork that counts #Oscar -winner Cillian Murphy as a past pupil

https://t.co/xqKczUQSyY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国周一表示，紧急会谈是解决海地不断升级的不稳定局势的 "关键时刻"。
item.description:
The US said Monday that emergency talks were a "critical moment" in addressing spiralling instability in Haiti, where gang violence has crippled the capital and forced foreign diplomats to evacuate https://t.co/lRzWUuvhYQ pic.twitter.com/W87dIOx79f

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 法新社说，周末发布的威尔士王妃凯瑟琳及其子女的修改后官方照片没有遵守 "职业道德标准"，法新社是撤下肖像画的几家全球通讯社之一。
item.description:
The modified official photo of Catherine, Princess of Wales, and her children released over the weekend did not respect "the ethical standards of the profession", said AFP, which was among several global news agencies that withdrew the portrait https://t.co/gyQ5VOeFGd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周一要求主审其封口费案件的纽约法官推迟审判，直至美国最高法院就其总统豁免权主张作出裁决。
item.description:
Donald Trump asked the New York judge on Monday who is presiding over his hush money case to delay the trial until the US Supreme Court rules on his claim of presidential immunity https://t.co/MfYsBWWPMv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 法国总理办公室周一表示，就在巴黎奥运会开幕前几个月，法国多个政府机构遭到了 "空前严重 "的网络攻击，但这些攻击已经得到控制。
item.description:
Cyberattacks of "unprecedented intensity" have targeted several French government institutions just months before the Paris Olympics but have been contained, the prime minister’s office said Monday https://t.co/azgrGF3slT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 对于饱受战争蹂躏的加沙地带的巴勒斯坦人来说，周一斋月的第一天就像其他日子一样到来：饥荒和疾病缠身，在帐篷里瑟瑟发抖，以色列和哈马斯武装分子交战五个多月后又受到炸弹的威胁
item.description:
The first day of #Ramadan on Monday arrived like others for Palestinians in war-ravaged Gaza: stalked by famine and disease, shivering in tents and threatened by bombs more than five months into fighting between Israel and Hamas militants https://t.co/w8mwp2NIb4 pic.twitter.com/ptHN4Mx6Sq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统雄心勃勃的 2025 年预算提案于周一公布，但在今年晚些时候的全国大选之前，该提案几乎肯定会在分歧严重的美国国会中胎死腹中。
item.description:
President Joe Biden's ambitious 2025 budget proposal, published Monday, is almost certain to be dead on arrival in the sharply divided US Congress ahead of national elections later this year https://t.co/RKNfXRNdaC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: @AFP 与 @AnujChopra 的最新报道：最近几个月，数百家模仿新闻机构的人工智能网站纷纷涌现，助长了虚假报道的爆炸式增长，研究人员称，在全球高风险选举年，这些虚假报道正在引发恐慌。
item.description:
New @AFP with @AnujChopra:

Hundreds of AI-powered sites mimicking news outlets have cropped up in recent months, fueling an explosion of false narratives that researchers say is stoking alarm in a year of high-stake elections around the world.https://t.co/ptjBITIOkF

— Bill McCarthy (@billdmccarthy) March 11, 2024

item.title: 布林肯抵达牙买加参加海地危机会谈，将华盛顿的大衣换成了墨镜
item.description:
Blinken arrives in Jamaica for Haiti crisis talks, trading Washington overcoat for shades pic.twitter.com/hQmtVeOWBM

— Shaun Tandon (@shauntandon) March 11, 2024

item.title: 法国专家向一把价值数百万美元的 18 世纪小提琴发射 X 射线，希望发现其神奇音质的秘密。
item.description:
French experts fired X-rays at a 18th-century violin worth millions hoping to discover the secret of its magical sound, they said https://t.co/Ipa5vaoJWG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 🕌☪️ 在印度尼西亚、加沙地带、塞内加尔和伊拉克拍摄的一些纪念伊斯兰教神圣斋戒月 #Ramadan 开始的照片。@BerryAdek、@wesselsjohn1、@saidkhatib 和 @Hussein_Afp。#AFP #Ramadan2024 #摄影 #摄影记者

#AFP #Ramadan2024 #photography #photojournalism pic.twitter.com/F70ls53sQu

— AFP Communications (@AFPcom) March 11, 2024

item.title: 对于饱受战争蹂躏的加沙地带的巴勒斯坦人来说，周一的#斋月#第一天和往常一样：饥荒和疾病缠身，在帐篷里瑟瑟发抖，在以色列和哈马斯武装分子交战五个多月后还面临着炸弹的威胁 ➡️
item.description:
The first day of #Ramadan on Monday arrived like others for Palestinians in war-ravaged Gaza: stalked by famine and disease, shivering in tents and threatened by bombs more than five months into fighting between Israel and Hamas militants ➡️ https://t.co/tiBeHO9h2H pic.twitter.com/WO2c1NVRzi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 本周的#切尔滕纳姆赛马节#将让爱尔兰的马匹与本国最优秀的马匹一决高下，由驯马大师威利-穆林斯（Willie Mullins）率领的爱尔兰最近在英爱对抗赛中大放异彩 ⬇️ #AFPSports
item.description:
This week's #CheltenhamFestival will pit the equine might of Ireland against the best of the home nation, with Ireland led by master trainer Willie Mullins enjoying the whip hand recently in the Anglo-Irish rivalry ⬇️ https://t.co/ZBge6xn16Z #AFPSports

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 德国法院周一判处一名美国男子无期徒刑，罪名是他去年在巴伐利亚著名的新天鹅堡附近强奸并杀害了一名美国游客 ⬇️
item.description:
A German court handed an American man a life sentence on Monday for raping and killing a fellow US tourist near Bavaria's famed Neuschwanstein castle last year ⬇️ https://t.co/N1eStyGAR5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: Fitzdares 博彩公司首席执行官 William Woodhams 告诉法新社 ⬇️ @pirateirwin #AFPSports ，#切尔滕纳姆赛马节对英国赛马的形象和健康发展 "至关重要"，但从 "许多方面来看，赛马迷们正在被这场本周的盛宴拒之门外"。
item.description:
The #CheltenhamFestival is "critical" for the image and health of British racing though in "many ways the racing fan is being priced out" of this week's showpiece, William Woodhams, CEO of Fitzdares bookmakers, told AFP ⬇️ https://t.co/akTwt15JDx @pirateirwin #AFPSports

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: #印度--在班加罗尔，售卖发光气球的年轻人在路边等待顾客📷 Idrees Mohammed #AFP
item.description:
#India - Youths selling illuminated balloons wait for customers along a roadside in Bengaluru.
📷 Idrees Mohammed #AFP pic.twitter.com/nEALk3zZ8Q

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 11, 2024

item.title: 航空公司和急救人员周一告诉法新社，从悉尼飞往奥克兰的拉塔姆航空公司航班上发生技术故障，导致飞机剧烈下坠，周一有 12 名乘客被送往医院，➡️。
item.description:
Twelve passengers were hospitalised on Monday after a technical problem on a LATAM flight from Sydney to Auckland caused the plane to dip violently, the airline and first responders told AFP on Monday ➡️ https://t.co/cGhEJDnZhG pic.twitter.com/ADw7yPz70C

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: #塞内加尔--在达喀尔的一次竞选集会上，反建制候选人联盟的支持者坐在墙边高呼。📸@wesselsjohn1 #AFP
item.description:
#Senegal - Supporters for the coalition of anti-establishment candidates chant as sit on a wall during a campaign rally in Dakar.
📸@wesselsjohn1 #AFP pic.twitter.com/BiVBLO2Ynu

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 11, 2024

item.title: 视频：参加 Moomba 节 "鸟人拉力赛 "的人们身着盛装，用自制的飞行装置将自己抛入墨尔本的亚拉河。
item.description:
VIDEO: Particpants in the Moomba Festival's Birdman Rally fling themselves into Melbourne's Yarra River with costumes and inventive homemade flying devices. pic.twitter.com/QCdN11hWu7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 法国总统府表示，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙将 "在未来几周内 "前往乌克兰，这显然是对原定访问的再次推迟。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron is to travel to Ukraine "in the coming weeks" the presidency said, in an apparent new postponement of a visit that was supposed to have already taken place.https://t.co/tzP1bFbqE7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 视频：印尼巴厘岛上的印度教徒为迎接印度教新年举行人像游行和净火仪式。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hindus in the Indonesian island of Bali hold an effigy parade and a purification fire ceremony in preparation for the Hindu new year. pic.twitter.com/hxHU0aq05m

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024

item.title: 研究人员周一表示，过去五年来，欧洲的武器进口量几乎翻了一番，部分原因是乌克兰战争，而俄罗斯的出口量则减少了一半。
item.description:
Weapons imports to Europe nearly doubled over the past five years, partly due to the war in Ukraine, while exports from Russia halved, researchers said on Monday.https://t.co/iyO2SW8txf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 11, 2024
